title: Textile, 1790–1810
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller or short plate on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 99 x 66 cm (39 x 26 in.)
description: Central curving stem from which grapes and several kinds of flowers and leaves grow. Blue on white. Two blue warps at each selvedge. Faded and poor condition.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1790–1810.
1790–1810. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller or short plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-111.
